intro.title: Hello, Iâ€™m Amar ðŸ‘‹ Developing Scalable Web Development Solutions
intro.body:
ENTC student skilled in web development, embedded systems, and DSA-based problem solving.
I enjoy building responsive web applications and solving logical challenges.
Focused on learning, innovation, and practical implementation.

about.name: Amar Dhadbale
about.p1: I am an Electronics and Telecommunication (ENTC) student with a strong interest in building complete, real-world digital solutions. My primary focus is full-stack web development, where I work extensively with Laravel, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create structured, scalable, and user-focused applications.
about.p2: I have solid experience in backend logic, database handling, and API integration, along with a strong command of frontend design and responsiveness. Alongside web development, I have practical knowledge of embedded systems, giving me a deeper understanding of how software interacts with hardware.
about.p3: I actively solve problems using Data Structures and Algorithms, which helps me write optimized and maintainable code. My programming experience includes Python, C, C++, and JavaScript, allowing me to adapt across different domains and project requirements.

_schema.site: Object. Basic site metadata: name, role, tagline, meta (title/description/keywords).
_schema.hero: Object. Hero section: tag, name, subtitle, buttons (primary/secondary).
_schema.intro: Object. Short intro used on home page: tag, title, body, ctaText, ctaLink.
_schema.about: Object. Full About/Journey intro used on Journey page: tag, name, p1, p2, p3, ctaText, ctaLink.
_schema.stats: Array. Stats displayed on home (label, count, optional suffix).
_schema.skills: Object. skills.cards (array of cards) and skills.progress (array of categories with items).
_schema.timeline: Array. Each item: year, title, description (rendered on Journey page timeline).
_schema.resume: Object. experience array and education array.
_schema.projects: Array. Each project: id (slug), title, category, shortDescription, fullDescription, problem, solution, impact (array), techStack (array), images (array), liveUrl (optional), repoUrl (optional), featured (bool).
_schema.testimonials: Array. Each testimonial: name, role, quote, avatar. Use testimonials.preview (front-page) or testimonials.all (full page) via data-bind.
_schema.certifications: Array. Each certification: id, title, issuingOrganization, year, description, credentialUrl (optional), logo (optional), category (Cloud/Programming/Data/Design).
_schema.contact: Object. Contact details: email, emailLink, location, availability, cta.
_schema.socialLinks: Array. Social links rendered in footer and contact: platform, url.
_schema.footer: Object. Footer strings like copyright and note.
_schema.cta: Object. Global CTA section with title, body, primary and secondary actions.

cards.title: Web Development & Laravel
cards.desc: Designing and developing dynamic, scalable websites using Laravel with clean backend architecture, database integration, authentication, and responsive frontend design.

cards.title: Frontend & Landing Pages
cards.desc: Building modern landing pages and frontend projects using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a strong focus on responsiveness, layout structure, and user interaction.

cards.title: SEO Optimization
cards.desc: Improving website visibility through on-page SEO, performance optimization, proper structure, and search-engine-friendly content practices.

cards.title: Embedded Systems Basics
cards.desc: Developing basic embedded projects using microcontrollers, sensors, and logic-based programming to understand hardwareâ€“software interaction.

timeline.title: Academic & Programming Basics
timeline.description: Completed secondary and  Higher Secondary education and built early foundations in logic, C, and C++.

timeline.title: ENTC Undergraduate
timeline.description: Started B.E. in Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering and strengthened core technical skills.

timeline.title: Frontend Development
timeline.description: Learned HTML, CSS, and JavaScript; built responsive websites and frontend projects.

timeline.title: React Developer
timeline.description: Built component-based UIs using React and modern frontend practices.

timeline.title: Full Stack Web Development Intern
timeline.description: Worked with PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript on dynamic, database-driven web applications.

timeline.title: DSA & Logical Thinking
timeline.description: Focused on data structures and algorithms to improve efficiency and coding structure.

timeline.title: Embedded Systems Practice
timeline.description: Built Arduino-based projects involving sensors, automation, and monitoring.

timeline.title: Laravel & App Development
timeline.description: Developed full-stack applications with Laravel and explored Flutter-based mobile development.

experience.desc: Designed and developed a professional tours and travel business website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Laravel. Implemented responsive layouts, service pages, contact forms, and SEO-friendly structure to enhance online visibility and customer engagement.

Worked on dynamic web applications using PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented CRUD operations, form handling, and responsive UI while gaining practical experience in full-stack development.

Completed hands-on cloud computing internship covering cloud fundamentals, virtualization concepts, and basic deployment workflows. Gained exposure to cloud services, infrastructure concepts, and practical use cases.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering

projects.title: Sai Tours & Travels Website
projects.shortDescription: A professional tours and travels business website with responsive design, service pages, and customer inquiry system.
projects.fullDescription: Sai Tours & Travels is a business website developed to establish a strong online presence for a tours and travel company. The project includes service listings, tour packages, inquiry forms, and SEO-friendly structure built using Laravel for scalability and maintainability.
projects.problem: The business lacked an online presence and an efficient way for customers to explore services and submit inquiries.
projects.solution: Designed and developed a responsive, SEO-optimized website with Laravel backend, dynamic pages, and secure inquiry handling.
impact: Improved online visibility for the business
Enabled customers to easily explore services and contact the company

projects.title: Laravel Blog Website
projects.shortDescription: A dynamic blog website built with Laravel featuring user authentication, post management, and a clean responsive UI.
projects.fullDescription: Laravel Blog Website is a full-stack blogging platform developed using Laravel. It allows users to create, edit, and manage blog posts with authentication, secure routing, and database-driven content management.
projects.problem: Static blog systems lack scalability, authentication, and structured content management.
projects.solution: Developed a Laravel-based blog system with MVC architecture, database integration, authentication, and CRUD functionality.
impact: Improved content management efficiency
Secure user authentication and authorization
Scalable backend architecture

projects.title: Beauty Parlor Management Website
projects.shortDescription: A PHP and MySQL-based beauty parlor website with appointment booking and service management.
projects.fullDescription: Beauty Parlor Management Website is a dynamic web application developed using PHP and MySQL. It allows customers to view services and book appointments, while admins can manage services, bookings, and customer data through a structured backend.
projects.problem: Manual appointment handling and service management leads to scheduling errors and inefficiency.
projects.solution: Built a PHPâ€“MySQL based system with online booking, database-driven services, and an admin management panel.
impact: Simplified appointment booking process
Improved service management
Reduced manual scheduling errors

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.shortDescription: A PHP and MySQL based Hospital Management System for patient records, appointments, and staff management.
projects.fullDescription: Hospital Management System is a dynamic web application developed using PHP and MySQL. It provides modules for patient registration, doctor scheduling, appointment handling, and basic reporting, streamlining hospital operations and improving data accessibility.
projects.problem: Manual record keeping and appointment management in a hospital leads to inefficiency and errors.
projects.solution: Developed a comprehensive PHPâ€“MySQL system that automates patient data management, appointment scheduling, doctor availability tracking, and basic reporting.
impact: Reduced manual paperwork and errors
Faster appointment scheduling
Improved patient and staff data management

projects.title: Blinkit Clone App
projects.shortDescription: A basic Flutter app inspired by Blinkit with simple UI screens.
projects.problem: To understand basic mobile app layout and navigation using Flutter.
projects.solution: Created a simple multi-page Flutter application with product listing and cart-style UI.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.shortDescription: A PHP and MySQL based Employee Management System for simple CRUD operations.
projects.fullDescription: Employee Management System is a web application built with PHP and MySQL that allows users to manage employee records including adding, editing, and deleting employee details in a structured database.
projects.problem: Managing employee data manually leads to disorganization and errors.
projects.solution: Developed a simple PHP application with MySQL database to perform CRUD operations on employee records.
impact: Streamlined employee data handling
Improved basic record organization

projects.title: Instagram Profile Clone
projects.shortDescription: A static Instagram profile clone built with HTML, CSS & JavaScript.
projects.fullDescription: Instagram Profile Clone is a frontend project replicating the UI layout of an Instagram user profile page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It demonstrates responsive design and interactive elements typical of a social media profile interface.
projects.problem: To learn frontend layout skills and practice structuring a real-world UI using standard web technologies.
projects.solution: Built a pixel-perfect Instagram profile clone with navigation, profile header, posts grid, and interactive elements using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
impact: Enhanced UI/UX layout skills
Improved understanding of CSS positioning and responsive design

projects.title: Coffee Web Landing Page
projects.shortDescription: A responsive coffee shop landing page built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.fullDescription: Coffee Web Landing Page is a frontend project creating a modern and responsive landing page for a coffee shop. It showcases clean layout design, attractive visuals, and interactive elements using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.problem: To practice UI design and responsive layout using core web technologies.
projects.solution: Designed and developed a coffee shop landing page with sections for features, menu highlights, customer testimonials, and contact call-to-action.
impact: Demonstrated responsive UI / UX layout
Showcased visual design and frontend skills

projects.title: Gym Web Project
projects.shortDescription: A responsive gym website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.fullDescription: Gym Web Project is a static gym landing website created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features sections like services, trainers, membership plans, testimonials, and contact call-to-action to showcase a complete gym promotional site.
projects.problem: To showcase frontend layout, responsive design, and interactive UI elements for a fitness/gym brand.
projects.solution: Designed and developed a multi-section, clean, and modern gym website with responsive layout and UI interactions using foundational web technologies.
impact: Improved frontend design and responsiveness skills
Demonstrated ability to structure multi-section web pages

projects.title: Loan Calculator
projects.shortDescription: A simple web-based loan calculator built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
projects.fullDescription: Loan Calculator is a frontend web tool built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that calculates monthly payments, total payment, and interest cost based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure inputs. It demonstrates basic form handling and dynamic calculations in the browser.
projects.problem: Users need a quick way to estimate loan payments without using spreadsheets or manual formulas.
projects.solution: Created an interactive web form that takes loan parameters and outputs monthly payment estimates in real time.
impact: Helped understand DOM interaction and form validation
Practiced basic algorithm implementation in JavaScript

projects.title: 20 Mini Projects (HTML, CSS & JavaScript)
projects.shortDescription: A collection of 20 mini projects built using core HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to practice frontend fundamentals.
projects.fullDescription: This repository contains 20 small frontend projects developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The projects include calculators, clocks, to-do apps, UI components, form validation, and interactive web tools. The goal was to strengthen core JavaScript logic, DOM manipulation, and responsive UI design.
impact: Improved JavaScript logic and DOM manipulation skills
Strengthened frontend fundamentals through hands-on practice
Built reusable UI components and utilities

testimonials.name: Vishal Kaklij
testimonials.quote: Amar delivered a clean, professional website that perfectly represents our tours and travel business. The site is responsive, easy to use, and helped us establish a strong online presence.

testimonials.name: Samruddhi Jadhav
testimonials.quote: The blog website Amar developed is smooth, well-structured, and easy to manage. The design and frontend flow made content publishing simple and visually appealing.

testimonials.name: Vinod Nikam
testimonials.quote: Amar optimized our website with proper SEO practices, improving structure, performance, and visibility. The results were noticeable, and the overall site quality improved significantly.

certificationsPage.title: Certifications & Credentials
certificationsPage.description: Professional certifications and coursework that demonstrate skills across cloud, programming, and design.
